properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM (SELECT MEMBER_NO ,MEMBER_ID ,MEMBER_NAME ,MEMBER_NICKNAME ,MEMBER_EMAIL ,MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE ,MEMBER_GRADE ,STATUS FROM MEMBER) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_GRADE = ? ,STATUS = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM DISABLE WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT M.MEMBER_NO ,MEMBER_ID ,MEMBER_NAME ,MEMBER_EMAIL ,MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE ,DISABLE_REASON FROM MEMBER M,DISABLE D WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = D.MEMBER_NO (+) AND STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE DISABLE D SET D.DISABLE_REASON = ? WHERE D.MEMBER_NO IN (SELECT M.MEMBER_NO FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = ?)
SELECT M.MEMBER_NO ,MEMBER_ID ,MEMBER_NAME ,MEMBER_EMAIL ,MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE ,DISABLE_REASON FROM MEMBER M ,DISABLE D WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = D.MEMBER_NO (+) AND STATUS = 'N' AND M.MEMBER_NO = ?
